title: How to Connect Two Paper Clips without Touching Them

steps.headline: Obtain two paper clips and a piece of paper.
steps.description: A dollar bill is about the right size, or you can use any long, narrow piece of paper.

steps.headline: Fold the piece of paper into thirds so it looks like a flattened "z".
steps.description: You should have a top layer, a middle layer, and a bottom layer.

steps.headline: Clip top layer and the middle layer together from the side, as shown.
steps.description: Put the clip towards the loose end.

steps.headline: Clip middle and bottom layers together with the other paper clip.
steps.description: Put the paper clip towards the loose end.

steps.headline: Pull the ends of the paper apart.
steps.description: If you've clipped the paper clips together correctly, they will move towards each other.

steps.headline: Keep pushing and pulling till it pops through
The paper clips will join and pop off the paper.

tyn: A dollar bill or other strip of paper.
text: Obtain two paper clips and a piece of paper. A dollar bill is about the right size, or you can use any long, narrow piece of paper. Fold the piece of paper into thirds so it looks like a flattened "z". You should have a top layer, a middle layer, and a bottom layer. Clip top layer and the middle layer together from the side, as shown. Put the clip towards the loose end. Clip middle and bottom layers together with the other paper clip. Put the paper clip towards the loose end. Pull the ends of the paper apart. If you've clipped the paper clips together correctly, they will move towards each other. Keep pushing and pulling till it pops through  The paper clips will join and pop off the paper.  Finished.
sentences: Obtain two paper clips and a piece of paper.
A dollar bill is about the right size, or you can use any long, narrow piece of paper.
Fold the piece of paper into thirds so it looks like a flattened "z".
You should have a top layer, a middle layer, and a bottom layer.
Clip top layer and the middle layer together from the side, as shown.
Put the clip towards the loose end.
Clip middle and bottom layers together with the other paper clip.
Put the paper clip towards the loose end.
Pull the ends of the paper apart.
If you've clipped the paper clips together correctly, they will move towards each other.
Keep pushing and pulling till it pops through  The paper clips will join and pop off the paper.
